careerBenefits.title: Professional Growth
careerBenefits.description: Continuous learning opportunities, mentorship programs, and clear advancement paths tailored to your career goals

careerBenefits.title: Work-Life Balance
careerBenefits.description: Flexible work arrangements, generous PTO, and policies that respect your personal time and wellbeing

careerBenefits.title: Inclusive Culture
careerBenefits.description: A diverse and supportive environment where every voice is valued, respected and empowered to contribute

careerBenefits.title: Global Exposure
careerBenefits.description: Opportunities to work with international clients and collaborate across our offices in 5 countries

careerBenefits.title: Competitive Compensation
careerBenefits.description: Attractive salary packages, performance bonuses, health benefits, and retirement plans

careerBenefits.title: Innovation Focus
careerBenefits.description: Be part of cutting-edge projects and contribute to developing transformative business solutions

openPositions.title: Senior Supply Chain Consultant
openPositions.description: Lead and execute supply chain transformation projects for our clients, leveraging your expertise in supply chain strategy, network optimization, and process improvement.
responsibilities: Partner with clients to identify supply chain challenges and develop innovative solutions
Lead project teams and workstreams to deliver high-quality results
Perform complex analyses to derive actionable insights
Develop implementation roadmaps and drive execution
Mentor junior consultants and contribute to knowledge development
requirements: 8+ years of experience in supply chain consulting or industry roles
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and client management abilities
Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business, or related field; MBA preferred
Experience with supply chain technologies and digital transformation

openPositions.title: Data Scientist
openPositions.description: Develop advanced analytics models and machine learning algorithms to help our clients extract actionable insights from their data and make better business decisions.
responsibilities: Design and implement machine learning models to solve complex business problems
Collaborate with consultants to integrate data insights into client solutions
Clean, transform, and analyze large datasets from various sources
Develop data visualization solutions to communicate findings effectively
Stay current with emerging technologies and methodologies in data science
requirements: 5+ years of experience in data science or related field
Proficiency in Python, R, or similar programming languages
Experience with ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.)
Strong statistical knowledge and data manipulation skills
Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field

openPositions.title: Business Development Manager
openPositions.description: Identify and pursue new business opportunities, develop client relationships, and drive revenue growth in the Asia-Pacific region.
responsibilities: Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve revenue targets
Build and maintain relationships with key decision-makers at target companies
Identify and qualify new sales opportunities through outreach and networking
Collaborate with delivery teams to develop compelling proposals
Track and report on sales activities and pipeline development
requirements: 7+ years of experience in B2B sales, preferably in consulting or professional services
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
Strong network and relationships in the APAC business community
Excellent presentation and negotiation skills
Bachelor's degree in Business or related field

openPositions.title: Financial Consultant
openPositions.description: Provide strategic financial advice to clients, helping them optimize their financial operations, improve performance, and achieve their business objectives.
responsibilities: Conduct financial assessments and identify improvement opportunities
Develop financial models and perform scenario analyses
Design and implement financial transformation initiatives
Advise clients on financial strategy and operational improvements
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver integrated solutions
requirements: 6+ years of experience in financial consulting or corporate finance
Strong financial modeling and analytical skills
Knowledge of financial systems and technologies
CPA, CFA, or MBA preferred
Excellent client communication and project management skills

openPositions.title: Digital Transformation Specialist
openPositions.description: Guide clients through their digital transformation journey, helping them leverage technology to enhance their business processes and customer experiences.
responsibilities: Assess clients' digital maturity and identify transformation opportunities
Develop digital roadmaps and implementation strategies
Lead digital transformation initiatives from concept to execution
Advise on technology selection and integration
Measure and report on transformation outcomes and ROI
requirements: 8+ years of experience in digital transformation or related fields
Strong understanding of digital technologies and their business applications
Experience leading large-scale transformation projects
Excellent stakeholder management and change management skills
Bachelor's degree in Business, IT, or related field; MBA a plus

openPositions.title: Junior Supply Chain Analyst
openPositions.description: Support supply chain consulting projects through data analysis, research, and solution development to help clients optimize their supply chain operations.
responsibilities: Collect and analyze supply chain data to identify trends and insights
Assist in developing client deliverables and presentations
Conduct research on industry best practices and benchmarks
Support senior consultants in client engagements
Contribute to the development of supply chain models and tools
requirements: 1-3 years of experience in supply chain or consulting
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Proficiency in Excel and data visualization tools
Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business, or related field
Excellent written and verbal communication skills

openPositions.title: Marketing Specialist
openPositions.description: Develop and execute marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, generate leads, and support business development efforts.
responsibilities: Create compelling content for various channels (website, social media, etc.)
Manage digital marketing campaigns and track performance
Develop thought leadership materials in collaboration with consultants
Coordinate events and webinars to showcase expertise
Analyze marketing metrics and optimize strategies accordingly
requirements: 4+ years of experience in B2B marketing, preferably in professional services
Strong content creation and digital marketing skills
Experience with marketing automation and CRM tools
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
Excellent project management and organizational skills

careersSEO.title: Careers at Thoucentric - Join Our Team of Innovators
careersSEO.description: Explore career opportunities at Thoucentric, where innovation meets purpose. Join our global team and help transform businesses through strategic insights and innovative solutions.
